query: [['Shia LaBeouf', ['Shia Saide LaBeouf ( ; born June 11, 1986) is an American actor, performance artist, and filmmaker.', ' He became known among younger audiences as Louis Stevens in the Disney Channel series "Even Stevens", a role for which LaBeouf received a Young Artist Award nomination in 2001 and won a Daytime Emmy Award in 2003.', ' He made his film debut in "The Christmas Path" (1998).', ' In 2004, he made his directorial debut with the short film "Let\'s Love Hate" and later directed a short film titled "Maniac" (2011), starring American rappers Cage and Kid Cudi.']], ['Maniac (2011 film)', ['Maniac (stylized as MANIAC) is an American short slasher film, directed by Shia LaBeouf.', ' It was released on October 31, 2011.', ' The short film stars American rappers Scott "Kid Cudi" Mecudi and Chris "Cage" Palko, as French-speaking serial killers. Mescudi and Palko also co-wrote the film with LaBeouf.']]] ['What is the date 3 months after the birthdate of the director of an American short slasher film with French-speaking serial killers that was released on October 31, 2011?\n Answer: ']

thoughts.brain_thought: To find the answer, first ensure you understand the birthdate of the director of the film mentioned in the query. The film is 'Maniac', directed by Shia LaBeouf, whose birthdate is June 11, 1986. From there, calculate the date 3 months after that birthdate. Make sure you're applying the correct method to add three months to a date, considering how months vary in length and the transition to the next year if needed.

llm_response.explanation: Shia LaBeouf, director of 'Maniac', was born on June 11, 1986. To find the date that is three months after this date, start counting from June 11, 1986. Adding three months leads us through July, August, and into September. Therefore, three months after June 11 is September 11, 1986. This calculation considers that each of the added months (July and August) has 31 and 30 days respectively, thus no complications arise from month lengths in this specific case. Therefore, the final calculated date is September 11, 1986.
